page.title: 11A Day Of My Life
page.content: Suzanne Forsman Age 10 I opened my eyes to find a dog ready to pounce on me! I dressed and went downstairs followed by my dog Dream.After breakfast I helped Mum to feed the pups with sixteen weetabix and puppy milk.Next I went for a ride on my horse Flicka and afterwards cleaned my tack. For dinner I had cheese sandwiches and a cup of coffee.I watched television when suddenly I had an idea! I would build another jumping course.It took me ages for the poles and stands kept falling on top of me! Once I had finished I caught Flicka again and spent the whole afternoon jumping him at tea time I gave him oats,pony nuts and mollichop and returned him to his field for the night.
